An sich ein gutes Spiel, macht Spaß zu zocken.
Die Idee ist recht gut, genau so wie die Umsetzung in den meißten Fällen. Man hat als Killer und als Überlebender jeweils Vor- und Nachteile, also sind die Runden fasst immer ausgegleichen.

Das einzige, das mich stört, ist, dass man entweder nur mit Fremden spielen kann, oder man muss genug Leute in der Freundeslioste haben, um eine Lobby zu füllen um mit diesen spileen zu können.
Wäre echt schön, wenn man sich z.B. ein oder zwei Freunde dazu holt um dann gegen Fremde spielen zu können.

I also thoroughly enjoy experiencing the same bugs which have been in the game for months.

Even though this game has had many balancing problems and bugs, it keeps going to a better direction. The idea is great and the gameplay is interesting. Despite the salt of the community, this game is very fun to play.

Very fun game but far from perfect! 

If you've watched one match then you know pretty much everything to expect from gameplay, it varies very little from match to match. That may come off as a bad thing but i dont see it that way. It has a very core function that the fun comes from mastering or at least finding new ways to go about it. It never really feels overly repetitive despite the fact you are essentially only going to be tasked with the same few task every match. I play solo so im always paired with randoms, that provides a nice little change up each match as i learn to adapt to different teammates play style.

Core Gameplay aside this game is very "haggard", from very unpolished animations to some of the cringiest grunts and groans i've ever heard in a game it just has a very "work in progress" vibe all over it! It is not enough to make the game unplayable or even less fun but i am looking forward to further touch ups, which we've gotten some already that have helped a bit.

Performance is where it kinda gets iffy for me, im running 2x 980ti in SLI with an i7-6700k at 3440x1440 and i hover around 45-55fps. Usually i just crank down some settings to lock in 60fps, but even maxed out this game looks like a remastered ps3 game so any lower and we get into ps2 era visuals. Sure graphics dont make a game, but when its this low quality and still cant lock in 60fps on a 650$ GPU then that is a problem.

Ну что приступлю писать обзор, не буду делать поэму скажу самое важное. В игре  достаточно много выживших, классных маньяков из фильмов, но за которых надо платить деньги. Полная атмосфера Dead by Daylight расскрывается глубокой ночью когда ты играешь один. В игру можно играть с друзьями поднимать ранги, так же создать свое лобби и пофаниться с друзьями. Самое не навистное, что есть в игре это кемперство и то что карл когда сделают голосовой чат в игре. Реально если играть одному, практически всегда тебя убивают, потому что игра создана для 5 человек и играть надо командой, а когда все играют сами по себе без инфы достаточно сложно выйгрывать.  Советую данную игру всем, особенно если хотите побыть в роли маньяка из легендарных фильмов) 7/10

This game is bad. Constantly versing players with full extra super rare perks as a new player without anything unlocked yet. Every single game with no exception survivors are lagging and playing as killer you cant gauge the distance since it appears as if they teleport around. Somehow this lagging makes survivors run as fast as you do even with 2nd tier bloodlust. Maps have so many obstacles for survivors to use, its just brainless how they run from pallet to pallet untill u brake 10 of them in one area, then theres 50 more elsewhere. Long loading times. Very slow leveling system. I would like to expierence all killers with theyr perks and surivors also , but that would take like 1000 games doing pretty much same stuff with one character not to mention others. Its not even anjoyable at this state more like annoying.

Разрабы, молодцы. Игру сделали интересную. Но вы её убили. Знаете чем? Easy Anti Cheat ваш не античит, просто ничто. Подбор матчей говнище. Играешь выживший 20 ранг против тебя маньяк фулл умения + 1 ранг. Как это понимать? Если маньяк 20 ранг то это читер 100% ибо фулл умения + видит сквозь стены (отсутствует перк на проявление ауры у выжившего но он маньяк видит тебя сквозь стены спокойно). Оптимизация тоже не радует. Нормальная видео карта, свежие драйвера установлены. Минимальные настройки графики. Каждая проверка реакции провал ибо фпс падает постоянно...
--------
Так же хочу добавить: Аболютно никому не советую покупать как саму игру так и дополнения, так же не играйте хорошо, за такое банят! Хорошо играл последние игры, никого матом не крыл, в итоге получаю бесрочный бан без объяснения причины, писал как разработчикам античита так и разработчикам игры (соответственно на английском языке), меня банально проигнорировали, мой вам совет, просто уходите с этой страницы, а если вы всё же купили её, то не играйте хорошо и не покупайте DLC. Все равно вас забанят навсегда без объяснения причины

TL;DR - Game is no longer balanced or fun for killer mains.

This game has now become a shit show. I have been playing this game consistently for a while now as a killer main, but it has become extremely difficult to get wins as a killer now. I have been red rank every season that I have played except 2, and now the game is impossible to play. Instead of slowly releasing killers and survivors, BHVR rushes to release DLC to increase the hype which unfortunately dies short once they are put in full release. There are no longer any powerful killers. I always played deathslinger but they nerfed his speed and ability so he is useless. Want to play myers? nope he has no chance of catching up to survivors who run in a straight line. Balance and master the game BHVR. I have put so many hours into this game and seriously want to see improvement. I have met three killer mains who had 2600 hrs + and they have become survivor mains because they stated killer was just not fun anymore. I used to hop on after work for a fun few matches but can't anymore.

I personally really enjoy this game. It gives me this rush of hunting real human players when I'm killer and this fear and dread as survivor that games like Slender Man gave us. The DbD Team provides many free expansions to the game, something not so common with modern games, and the dlc they do charge is very affordable if you so choose to go that route. They listen to feedback and I have really enjoyed my nearly 300 hrs in this game. 

However this game is still unfinished and is always being balanced and fixed. That being said if you are looking to get this game I would recommend giving it a solid week of gameplay. Reason, learning the game with a killer on your ass can be rough and they feel very strong until you learn to properly survive. As for killer, you will feel like you are playing a chasing simulator where survivors will just tea bag infront of you while you try to learn the ropes of becoming a good killer.

I do believe this game is a gem and worth a try if you have $20 burning a hole in your pocket :)

The game itself is okay. Some balance changes are needed like fixing saboteur perk.

DbD survivors harrashing me in game and Steam profile isn't ok. I already deleted many messages and ignored the threats of reporting. Toxic community is the sole reason for not recommending this game.

Edit in 2019: I decided to give it another spin to see if it has gone better. This game is horrendous nowdays especially for a killer. You are expected to wipe the whole team or derank. Meanwhile survivors can loop, swf (communication > killer) and gen-rush with only 1-2 players....even when you pick anti-gen perks.

I would personally fire the dev responsible for balancing.

I do recommend the game, only if you're up to getting stressed up by bugs and coward tactics (like face camping).
It's a great game, a real good one... I mean, the idea.  But the Devs are not what you could consider... good ones. 
The game is good, killers are good, survivors are good. But it's a game that would probably make one part of the 1v4 more over powered that the other In this case, Devs tend to "try" to balance things a little, and they do, balance it in favour of the killers, when the game just started, Window looping was a strategy survivors would use to make killer lose time. They make it so windows would get blocked after a little, pallets get broken faster, killers get a speed boost for being in a chase for so long... But there are things killers do, like Facecamping to get easy points, making a survivor lose points like nothing, so what the Devs do? nothing. 
Really, devs need to do something about these kind of things, because game is getting boring by the minute, I love the game, don't missunderstand me, but it has some little things that make someone a little less prone to play the game anymore. I want, and i like the game, but those things are completely unfair.

Used to have a positive review of this game but I cant anymore. About 5% of this game's playerbase hacks in some form or fashion. Due to the fact that Survivor and Killer matchmaking rating is dictated by Kills/Escapes, you will run into hackers every other game if you have a high enough rating. I have over 4k hours. I literally cannot avoid hackers at this point unless I purposely lose 50 games in a row in order to lower my MMR. The game is unplayable atm at a high level, but because new players buying the game and its myriad of 10$ cosmetics, the developers dont care. Just check out their last Q&A. No mention of hackers whatsoever. Yet the good players have been in an uproar for weeks.

Fix your fucking Anti-Cheat.

I'll admit that at first the game REALLY stunk when it came to balance and bugs and even caused me to put the game aside for a while and just wait for everything to be fixed. That was around the time when the free nurse update came out. 

Then, just yesterday (I think?) a new DLC comes out for the crazy electro doctor and I decided to give it another shot, so I reinstalled and queued up as survivor. After a few games of suriving, I gotta say the game has become a lot more fun and balanced since the last time I played. I even ended up buying the Myers DLC because he's my favorite fictional serial killer of all-time and I have been having an absolute blast stalking and killing people as if I really was Myers himself. Sure, the game still has its fair share of bugs and balance issues, but as of right now that's not personally stopping me from having fun. However, do take my opinion with a grain of salt, because I'm still at ~18 rank in both survivor and killer, so that is subject to change as I get into the higher ranks. 

I have no real issues with connecting to a game although it can take some time depending on the time of the day. As far as specs go, I have a GTX 970 with an i5 2300 @2.8GHz 10GB RAM installed on my SSD. Not the best rig I'll admit, but the game runs pretty damn smooth aside from the occasional lag and hiccups. Keep in mind that you don't really have much control of graphics other than a preset menu (Low, Medium, High, Ultra) and your basic full screen, brightness, etc. Not the best optimized game but not a big deal for someone like me. 

For $20? Honestly that's a pretty damn good price for the content that you're getting without the paid DLCs. If you DO decide to buy DLC, keep in mind that it is possible to test out those DLC killers/survivors in-game before purchase.
